name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計與英語談話情境的塑造(如小組討論，面談)，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:
Week 1: Introduction, the Best Offer 寂寞拍賣師
Theme One: Going through the labyrinth 闖越迷宮
Week 2: The Giver 記憶傳授人 by Lois Lowry 
Week 3: The Maze Runner 移動迷宮 by James Dashner
Week 4: The Hunger Games 飢餓遊戲 by Suzanne Collins
Week 5: The City of Amber 微光城市 by Jeanne DuPrau
Theme Two: Solving the Mystery  解開謎團
Week 6: Sherlock Holmes and John Watson 福爾摩斯 by Authur Conan Doyle
Week 7: The Girl with the Dragon Tatoos 龍紋身的女孩 by Stieg Larsson
Week 8: The Girl with the Pearl Earring 戴珍珠耳環的少女 by Tracy Chevalier
Week 9 (Mid-term exam week): Gone Girl 控制 by Gillian Flynn
Theme Three:  Looking for the Self 尋找自我
Week 10: The Perks of Being a Wallflower 壁花男孩 by Stephen Chbosky
Week 11: The Help 姊妹 by Kathryn Stockett
Week 12: Alice in the Wonderland 愛麗絲夢遊仙境 by C. S. Lewis
Week 13: The Golden Compass 黃金羅盤 by Philip Pullman
Week 14: The Kite Runner 追風箏的孩子 by Khaled Hosseini
Theme Four: Love and Passion
Week 15: Stardust 星塵傳奇 by Neil Gaiman
Week 16: The Book Thief 偷書賊 by Markus Zusak
Week 17:  The Time Traveler's Wife 時空旅人之妻 by Audrey Niffenegger
Week 18 (Final examination week): Wrapping up
scorePolicy:
I. Weekly performance in classroom participation and dialogue presentation: 
5% X 16 = 80%
II. Final project presentation, including script and performance: 20%
materials:
1. Good Chats (3rd edition),by Sandsberry, Sorenson, and Ring. Taipei: Bookman, 2008.
2. Essential Idioms in English (New Edition), by Dixson. New York: Pearson Education, 1994.
3. Dictionary of Idioms, by Terban.  New York:  Scholastic, 1996.
4.Idioms Made Easy:  Stories of Selected English Idioms. By Tseng and Kao. Taipei: Bookman, 2004.
